articles.title: US sees record hospitalisation of kids under 5, UK says 4th Covid jab not needed - India Today
articles.description: As Covid rages on, the US is witnessing a record number of hospitalisation of children under the age of five. Meanwhile, the UK has said there is no need for a fourth dose of the Covid vaccine as of now.
